name: oncoanalyser-tumor-normal
title: Tumor-Normal Cancer Analysis (WGS)
description: Comprehensive somatic variant calling from tumor-normal WGS pairs. Detects SNVs, indels, SVs, CNVs, and driver mutations using Hartwig Medical Foundation tools. Samplesheet format: `sample_id,sample_type,sequence_type,filetype,filepath`
content:
Comprehensive Tumor-Normal Cancer Genomics

oncoanalyser integrates the Hartwig Medical Foundation (HMF) cancer analysis toolkit for clinical-grade somatic variant calling from matched tumor-normal WGS data.

Why Tumor-Normal Analysis?

  • Somatic Variant Detection: Distinguish cancer mutations from germline variants
  • Clinical Accuracy: HMF tools validated on >60,000 cancer genomes
  • Comprehensive: SNVs, indels, SVs, CNVs in one pipeline
  • Driver Mutations: Identify actionable oncogenic events
  • Tumor Mutational Burden: Calculate TMB for immunotherapy
  • Microsatellite Instability: MSI status determination

Hartwig Tools Integrated

  • PURPLE: Copy number, purity, ploidy estimation
  • SAGE: Somatic SNV/indel calling
  • GRIDSS: Structural variant detection
  • LINX: SV interpretation, gene fusions, viral integrations
  • CHORD: Homologous recombination deficiency (HRD)
  • SIGS: Mutational signature analysis
  • VIRUSBREAKEND: Viral integration detection

Clinical Applications

  • Precision Oncology: Identify targetable mutations
  • Therapy Selection: Match mutations to FDA-approved drugs
  • Clinical Trials: Stratify patients by genomic features
  • Resistance Mechanisms: Discover acquired resistance mutations
  • Tumor Evolution: Track clonal dynamics
  • Liquid Biopsy: ctDNA variant calling

Variants Detected

Small Variants: SNVs, indels (SAGE)

Structural Variants: DEL, DUP, INV, TRA (GRIDSS)

Gene Fusions: Oncogenic fusions (LINX)

Copy Number: Gains, losses, amplifications (PURPLE)

Viral Integrations: HPV, EBV, HBV, etc.

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet with columns:

  • group_id: Patient identifier
  • subject_id: Subject ID
  • sample_id: Unique sample name
  • sample_type: 'tumor' or 'normal'
  • sequence_type: 'dna'
  • filetype: 'bam' or 'fastq'
  • filepath: Absolute path or stash:// URL

Key Outputs

  • Somatic VCF: All somatic variants
  • Driver Catalog: Oncogenic driver mutations
  • CNV Profile: Genome-wide copy number
  • Purity/Ploidy: Tumor fraction estimates
  • Mutational Signatures: COSMIC signatures
  • Gene Fusions: Fusion transcripts
  • Clinical Report: Actionable findings

Perfect for: Cancer genomics • Precision oncology • Clinical WGS • Driver discovery • Therapy selection
